comments.author: mwu.code@gmail.com
comments.creator: mwu.code@gmail.com
comments.text: For the gonk backend, we bypass most of the logic in NSPR's configure and directly pass in CC/CXX/CFLAGS/CPPFLAGS/CXXFLAGS/etc. to avoid duplicating the detection logic in NSPR's configure. We can also do this for Android, and possibly other platforms.
comments.raw_text: For the gonk backend, we bypass most of the logic in NSPR's configure and directly pass in CC/CXX/CFLAGS/CPPFLAGS/CXXFLAGS/etc. to avoid duplicating the detection logic in NSPR's configure. We can also do this for Android, and possibly other platforms.
